about_the_game:
The Wargaming Publisher Weekend is here, and it’s bringing you an unmissable opportunity to take command of history's steel juggernauts! For a limited time, claim your free 7-day rental of Japanese Tier VI Premium battleship Mutsu and unleash her mighty firepower across the seas of World of Warships.

This exclusive package includes:


  • 7-day rental of Tier VI Premium battleship Mutsu
  • Port slot to house your temporary flagship
  • Commander with 6 skill points to lead her into battle

Feel the power of Mutsu's formidable 410 mm guns and experience her rich history as one of Japan’s naval titans, all while enjoying intense naval battles against Captains from around the globe.

🛡️ Available Until February 27, 2025 🛡️
Don’t miss this chance to bolster your fleet during the Wargaming Publisher Weekend. Dive into the action and test the might of this iconic battleship today!

Disclaimer: This exclusive offer is only available for World of Warships accounts created through Steam.

For a limited time, claim your free 7-day rental of Japanese Tier VI Premium battleship Mutsu and unleash her mighty firepower across the seas of World of Warships.

This exclusive package includes:

Feel the power of Mutsu's formidable 410 mm guns and experience her rich history as one of Japan’s naval titans, all while enjoying intense naval battles against Captains from around the globe.

🛡️ Available Until February 27, 2025 🛡️
Don’t miss this chance to bolster your fleet during the Wargaming Publisher Weekend. Dive into the action and test the might of this iconic battleship today!

Disclaimer: This exclusive offer is only available for World of Warships accounts created through Steam.

name: World of Warships — Command the Seas with Mutsu!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

esrb.interactive_elements: Users Interact, In-Game Purchases (Includes Random Items)

oflc.descriptors: Chance-based and in-game purchases, online interactivity and chat

short_description: For a limited time, claim your free 7-day rental of Japanese Tier VI Premium battleship Mutsu and unleash her mighty firepower across the seas of World of Warships.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
